items.headline: Google’s AI summaries are stealing traffic, publisher of Rolling Stone, Variety says in lawsuit
items.summary_en: Penske Media says Google’s search engine is cannibalizing its businesses, in a lawsuit filed late Friday.

items.headline: Why the 10-year Treasury yield’s bounce back above 4% should be a warning for investors
items.summary_en: A tug-of-war has erupted in the $29 trillion Treasury market between investors who worry that cracks in the labor market could prompt the Federal Reserve to dramatically cut interest rates and those who fear that the central bank’s fight against inflation isn’t yet won.

items.headline: Tesla’s stock climbs after Musk sends this $1 billion vote of confidence
items.summary_en: Tesla’s stock has underperformed this year, but Musk is putting more of his money where his mouth is as he makes his first open-market purchase of shares since 2020.
